Text:
Oh no! I just realized that the version I released has a bug... one of the chapter buttons points to the wrong chapter!

What do you guys think -- should I delete this torrent and start seeding it all over again?

Okay, I made a small patcher to fix the problem (for Windows only), you can download it at http://www.filefactory.com/file/da426a/ . (Though I suspect most of you won't care about one incorrectly linked chapter button.)
How do you watch this? Does it work with BSPlayer? What format / extension is it? And please seed!
Be wonderful if somebody could reseed this
